text: Wafat/wafah si tumo si ""ƙobd"" gbigba eni kan kuro lowo eni kan ninu surah ali ‘Imron 3:55 ati surah al-Mo’dah elesin ’Islam ni awon t’o tele ‘Isa omo Moryam ('alaehi-ssolatu wa-ssalam). Ati ‘Isa omo Moryam ('alaehi-ssolatu wa-ssalam) ati owo awon t’o tele e loju aye re musulumi ni won gege bi won se pera won bee ninu surah yii
